greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of eta(q^2)^12/(eta(q)^4eta(q^4)^5) in powers of q.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: a[n_] := a[n] = If[n==0, 1, Sum[DivisorSum[j, {-3, 4, -8, 4}[[1 + Mod[#, 4]]]*#&]*a[n-j], {j, 1, n}]/n]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 100}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 25 2015, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
xref: A083703(n)=(-1)^n a(n). a(2n)=0 iff n in A004215 (checked up to n=343).
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Feb 28 2003
